items.sentence: I'm very grateful to Tom for saving my life.
Tom took a deep breath and started speaking.
Were you the one who asked Tom to help Mary?
It seems Tom got offended by what Mary said.
Tom is convinced he's doing the right thing.
That must've happened while I was in Boston.
Tom said he wouldn't mind doing that for us.
Tom missed the bus he was planning to catch.
Tom left the gate open and his dog ran away.
I grew up on a farm not too far from Boston.
Tom was the last person to leave the office.
Tom was at Mary's house on Monday afternoon.
Tom spends too much time in front of the TV.
Tom spends a lot of time in front of the TV.
Does Tom still go to the same school as you?
Does Tom still get along with his coworkers?
Do you think Tom will pass his driving test?
Do you think Tom and Mary are still married?
Do both Tom and Mary have your phone number?
Tom didn't want to finish what he was doing.
